6 import ELO.locale.index as lang

8 class LessonForm(forms.Form):
9  lesson_id = forms.IntegerField(required=True)
10  slide_number = forms.IntegerField(required=True)
11 
12  def clean_lesson_id(self):
13  return Id(self.cleaned_data['lesson_id'])
14 
15  def clean_slide_number(self):
16  return Id(self.cleaned_data['slide_number'])

18 class MultipleChoiceExercise(forms.Form):
19  options = forms.ChoiceField(widget = forms.RadioSelect,
20  required = True,
21  label = "")
22 
23  def clean_options(self):
24  return dict(self.cleaned_data['options'])
25 
26 class FillTheBlankExercise(forms.Form):
27  blank = forms.CharField(required = True, label="")
28 
29  def clean_blank(self):
30  return PlainText(self.cleaned_data['blank']).value
31 
32 class UnscrambleExercise(forms.Form):
33  bloat = forms.CharField(required = True, label="")
34 
35  def clean_bloat(self):
36  return self.cleaned_data['bloat'].split()
37 
38 class CrossWordExercise(forms.Form):
39  bloat = forms.CharField(required = True, label="")
40 
41  def clean_bloat(self):
42  wordList = self.cleaned_data['bloat'].split('_')
43  retList = []
44 
45  for word in wordList:
46  x,y,d,w = word.split()
47  retList.append(" ".join([x,y,d,w]))
48 
49  return retList
